/* * @Author: EmberCCC 1810888456@qq.com * @Date: 2022-07-22 15:01:06 * @LastEditors: EmberCCC 1810888456@qq.com * @LastEditTime: 2022-07-22 18:59:53 * @FilePath: \bl-device-manage-test\src\layouts\SocketManage\MaLayout\index.js * @Description: 这是默认设置,请设置`customMade`, 打开koroFileHeader查看配置 进行设置: https://github.com/OBKoro1/koro1FileHeader/wiki/%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE */ import { InfoCircleOutlined, MoreOutlined, TeamOutlined, UserOutlined } from "@ant-design/icons"; import { Checkbox, Radio, Tooltip } from "antd"; import { toJS } from "mobx"; import { inject, observer } from "mobx-react"; import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import '../index.css' import './index.css' const MaLayout = observer(({ SocketStore }) => { const { normalList, maSelectKey, maSelectObj, canClick, deValue, roValue, inDCheck, inRLCheck, inRMCheck, mulSelect, fatherIds, itemName } = SocketStore useEffect(() => { SocketStore.getNormalList(); SocketStore.getAllDepartment(); console.log(11); }, []) const handleMenu = (obj, value) => { SocketStore.getAllDepartment(); SocketStore.setValue('maSelectKey', value) SocketStore.setValue('maSelectObj', obj) SocketStore.setValue('deValue', obj['authDto']['scope']['department'][0] == -1 ? 'all' : 'scope') SocketStore.setValue('roValue', obj['authDto']['scope']['role'][0] == -1 ? 'all' : 'scope') SocketStore.setValue('inDCheck', obj['authDto']['addressBook']['department']) SocketStore.setValue('inRLCheck', obj['authDto']['addressBook']['role'][0]) SocketStore.setValue('inRMCheck', obj['authDto']['addressBook']['role'][0]) console.log(toJS(value)); console.log(toJS(obj)); console.log(toJS(mulSelect)); console.log(toJS(fatherIds)); console.log(toJS(itemName)); } return (
系统管理员
SocketStore.setValue('maSelectKey', '-1')} className={`ma_left_menu ${maSelectKey == '-1' ? `checked` : ``}`}> 系统管理员

{ normalList.map((item, index) => { let clsName = "" if (item['id'] == maSelectKey) { clsName = 'ma_left_menu one_menu checked' } else { clsName = 'ma_left_menu one_menu' } return (
handleMenu(item, item['id'])} className={clsName}>
{item['name']}
) }) }

+ 选择可管理的部门
) } { deValue == 'scope' && obj['authDto']['scope']['department'].length != 0 && (
) }

+ 选择可管理的角色
) } { roValue == 'scope' && obj['authDto']['scope']['role'].length != 0 && (
) }

互联组织 { console.log(value) }} style={{ marginLeft: "40px" }}>可见可管理(勾选后，默认管理范围为全部互联组织)
) }
) }) export default inject((stores) => ({ SocketStore: stores.SocketStore }))(MaLayout)
